derivation: from the same as H161 (אֹהַד); united;
outline:
Ehud = "I will give thanks: I will be praised"
  1. class='lex2'>or "undivided, union" in (1Ch. 8:6) only
  • Benjamite judge of Israel, deliverer of Israel from Moab
  • another Benjamite, son of Bilhan (1Ch. 8:6)
strongs_def: Ehud, the name of two or three Israelites
